BaseEntity - Class in it.unicam.cs.mpgc.jbudget125576.model.entity
Abstract JPA base class that hold a Long id and try to be proxy-safe for equals/hashCode (it use Hibernate.getClass(Object) for checks).

bindCategoryCombo(ComboBox<Category>, Supplier<List<Category>>) - Method in class it.unicam.cs.mpgc.jbudget125576.control.base.AbstractView
Binds a ComboBox of Category to: Render items using the category name in both the drop-down list and the button cell. Load items via the given loader immediately and every time the combo is about to be shown. Preserve the current selection by matching on BaseEntity.getId() if the selected id still exists.
